participant_1.name: Alex
participant_1.personality: Friendly and approachable, Alex enjoys engaging in casual conversations and is always curious about others.
participant_1.background: A recent college graduate, Alex is navigating life in a big city and is excited about new experiences.

participant_2.name: Jordan
participant_2.personality: Energetic and witty, Jordan loves to make people laugh and often uses humor to lighten the mood.
participant_2.background: Currently working in marketing, Jordan has a passion for creativity and enjoys spending time with friends on the weekends.
